field.name: module_position
field.label: Position
field.description: Choose which module position to style

field.name: module_bg_image
field.label: Background Image
field.description: Choose a background image for this module

field.name: module_bg_color
field.label: Background Color
field.description: Choose a background/Border color for this module

field.name: module_title_color
field.label: Headings/Title Color
field.description: Choose a Headings/Title color for this module (inc. H# tags)

field.name: module_text_color
field.label: Text Color
field.description: Choose a text color for this module

field.name: module_button_color
field.label: Button Color
field.description: Choose a button color for this module

field.name: module_padding_top
field.label: Top Padding
field.description: Set a top padding for this module. This will override the default template padding. Leave blank to revert back to the default template padding.

field.name: module_padding_right
field.label: Right Padding
field.description: Set a right padding for this module. This will override the default template padding. Leave blank to revert back to the default template padding.

field.name: module_padding_bottom
field.label: Bottom Padding
field.description: Set a bottom padding for this module. This will override the default template padding. Leave blank to revert back to the default template padding.

field.name: module_padding_left
field.label: Left Padding
field.description: Set a left padding for this module. This will override the default template padding. Leave blank to revert back to the default template padding.

field.name: module_margin_top
field.label: Top Margin
field.description: Set a top margin for this module. This will override the default template margin. Leave blank to revert back to the default template padding.

field.name: module_margin_right
field.label: Right Margin
field.description: Set a right margin for this module. This will override the default template margin. Leave blank to revert back to the default template padding.

field.name: module_margin_bottom
field.label: Bottom Margin
field.description: Set a bottom margin for this module. This will override the default template margin. Leave blank to revert back to the default template padding.

field.name: module_margin_left
field.label: Left Margin
field.description: Set a left margin for this module. This will override the default template margin. Leave blank to revert back to the default template padding.
